recipesJson.name: Peanut Butter and Jam Sandwich with Banana slices
recipesJson.author: DataNotAnecdotes
recipesJson.description:
Courtesy of New Amsterdam Vapes.

"This is my new favorite all day vape recipe. It's a salty peanut butter with sweet fruit jam and bananas. One of my favorite snacks and makes for a great vape."

Video link;
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZeDokJo8g9s

pageContext.name: Peanut Butter and Jam Sandwich with Banana slices
